name: Folded Hands
baseMeaning: Two hands pressed together with fingers pointing up.
tldr: Means 'please', 'thank you', 'praying', or 'namaste' depending on context.

contextMeanings.meaning: Expressing gratitude or saying thank you.
Saying please or making a request.

platformNotes.note: Common for expressing gratitude, hopes, or requests.
Often used in captions for gratitude or spirituality.
Acceptable for expressing thanks in professional contexts.

generationalNotes.note: Primarily used for 'please' or 'thank you' rather than religious prayer.
Context-dependent - can be gratitude, please, or prayer.
May interpret primarily as prayer or religious gesture.

warnings.title: Multiple meanings
warnings.description: Can be interpreted as praying, thank you, please, or high-five depending on the recipient.
